create or replace PACKAGE lm_pcm_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_physical_class_dom
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:15)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'LM_PCM_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_PHYSICAL_CLASS_DOM';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION pcm_select_row( i_pcm_NAME   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.NAME%TYPE
                       , o_rt_pcm   OUT lm_physical_class_dom%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pcm_select_row_uk1( i_pcm_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pcm  OUT lm_physical_class_dom%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pcm_select_row_upd( i_pcm_NAME   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.NAME%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pcm   OUT lm_physical_class_dom%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pcm_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pcm_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                               , o_rt_pcm  OUT lm_physical_class_dom%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE pcm_lock_row( i_pcm_NAME   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.NAME%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pcm_lock_row_nowait( i_pcm_NAME   IN  lm_physical_class_dom.NAME%TYPE )
;


END lm_pcm_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_pcm_tapi_pck
is




function pcm_select_row( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type
                       , o_rt_pcm   out lm_physical_class_dom%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pcm ( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_physical_class_dom pcm
            where pcm.name = i_pcm_name ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pcm( i_pcm_name => i_pcm_name );
         fetch c_pcm into o_rt_pcm;
         l_found := c_pcm%found;
         close c_pcm;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pcm%isopen
         then
            close c_pcm;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pcm_select_row;

function pcm_select_row_uk1( i_pcm_description   in  lm_physical_class_dom.description%type
                           , o_rt_pcm  out lm_physical_class_dom%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pcm ( i_pcm_description   in  lm_physical_class_dom.description%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_physical_class_dom pcm
          where pcm.description = i_pcm_description ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pcm(i_pcm_description => i_pcm_description);
         fetch c_pcm into o_rt_pcm;
         l_found := c_pcm%found;
         close c_pcm;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_pcm%isopen
      then
         close c_pcm;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pcm_select_row_uk1;

function pcm_select_row_upd( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type
                           , o_rt_pcm   out lm_physical_class_dom%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pcm ( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_physical_class_dom pcm
            where pcm.name = i_pcm_name 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pcm( i_pcm_name => i_pcm_name );
   fetch c_pcm into o_rt_pcm;
   l_found := c_pcm%found;
   close c_pcm;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pcm%isopen
      then
         close c_pcm;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pcm_select_row_upd;

function pcm_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pcm_description   in  lm_physical_class_dom.description%type
                               , o_rt_pcm  out lm_physical_class_dom%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := pcm_select_row_uk1( i_pcm_description   =>  i_pcm_description
                                   , o_rt_pcm => o_rt_pcm );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := pcm_select_row_upd( i_pcm_name => o_rt_pcm.name
                                      , o_rt_pcm => o_rt_pcm );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end pcm_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure pcm_lock_row( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pcm ( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_physical_class_dom pcm
              where pcm.name = i_pcm_name 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pcm_name is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pcm_lock_row_nowait( i_pcm_name => i_pcm_name );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pcm( i_pcm_name => i_pcm_name );
                  close c_pcm;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pcm%isopen
         then
            close c_pcm;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pcm_lock_row;

procedure pcm_lock_row_nowait( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pcm_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pcm ( i_pcm_name   in  lm_physical_class_dom.name%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_physical_class_dom pcm
               where pcm.name = i_pcm_name 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pcm_name is not null
         then
            
            open c_pcm( i_pcm_name => i_pcm_name );

            close c_pcm;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pcm%isopen
        then
           close c_pcm;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'NAME = "'||i_pcm_name||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pcm_lock_row_nowait;


end lm_pcm_tapi_pck;
